content: A mixture of Cd(NO3)2·6H2O (0.0346 g, 0.100 mmol), H2oba (0.0258 g, 0.100 mmol), mmmb (0.0224 g, 0.100 mmol), NaOH (0.008 g, 0.2 mmol) in H2O (10 mL) was sealed in a 16 mL Teflon-lined stainless steel container and heated at 150 °C for 72 h. After cooling to room temperature, colourless block crystals were collected by filtration and washed by water and ethanol several times (yield 23.2 %, based on Cd). Elemental analysis for C27H22CdN4O6 (Mr = 610.89): C 53.08, H 3.63, N 9.17 %; found: C 53.22, H 3.64, N 9.19 %. IR (KBr, cm−1) 3601 (s), 2375 (w), 1645 (s), 1421 (s), 1123 (m), 981 (m), 742 (m), 652 (s).
clean_text:
Synthesis of the Complex [Cd(oba)(mmmb)⋅H2O]n (1)

A mixture of Cd(NO3)2⋅6H2O (0.0346 g, 0.100 mmol), H2oba (0.0258 g, 0.100 mmol), mmmb (0.0224 g, 0.100 mmol), NaOH (0.008 g, 0.2 mmol) in H2O (10 mL) was sealed in a 16 mL Teflon-lined stainless steel container and heated at 150 °C for 72 h. After cooling to room temperature, colourless block crystals were collected by filtration and washed by water and ethanol several times (yield 23.2 %, based on Cd). Elemental analysis for C27H22CdN4O6 (Mr = 610.89): C 53.08, H 3.63, N 9.17 %; found: C 53.22, H 3.64, N 9.19 %. IR (KBr, cm-1) 3601 (s), 2375 (w), 1645 (s), 1421 (s), 1123 (m), 981 (m), 742 (m), 652 (s).
